title: Establishes the inmate fraud act, which creates the crime of inmate fraud, allows inmates accounts to be frozen and establishes the victim of inmate fraud fund
summary: Establishes the inmate fraud act, which creates the crime of inmate fraud, allows inmates' accounts to be frozen and establishes the victims of inmate fraud fund.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing the crime of inmate fraud, to amend the correction law, in relation to freezing accounts of inmates and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the victim of inmate fraud fund
